sentences: Ta kolis alt 'vahetult alumiselt korruselt' üles.
context: The word 'kolis' is the past tense (3rd person singular) of the verb 'kola', which means to move or transfer. In this context specifically, it appears in the phrase 'kolis alt üles' meaning 'moved from below/ground floor up'. The adverb 'alt' indicates movement from a lower position or underneath something else.
